scene.description: Ultra-photorealistic golden hour mirror selfie in a cozy gamer bedroom, 9:16 vertical

elements: large mirror placed directly in front of the chair
natural golden hour sunlight streaming from side window
environment.lighting: pure warm golden hour sunlight, beautiful rim light on hair and skin, soft shadows

photography.camera_style: iPhone mirror selfie, phone visible in hand

subject.description: Gorgeous early-20s Scandinavian girl, platinum blonde hair, striking ice-blue eyes, full natural lips, flawless fair skin with a light golden glow, delicate yet defined facial features, soft feminine beauty
subject.pose: sitting curled up adorably in gaming chair â€“ knees pulled tightly to chest, chin resting on knees, feet on seat edge
subject.eyes: looking down at phone screen with soft, peaceful, slightly sleepy expression
subject.hair: platinum blonde, messy high bun loosely secured with a pencil, lots of soft face-framing strands catching golden light
subject.headphones: cute pastel pink over-ear headphones perfectly on head

clothing.top: very short white ribbed crop tank top, thin straps
clothing.bottom: tiny heather grey cotton lounge shorts, super short length, soft relaxed fit

subject.body: soft natural thicker thighs, average natural chest, barefoot
